text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea platyclados (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Dark Red Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Sumatra, peninsular Malaysia and Borneo. It is an endangered species threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea platyclados". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33136A9761412. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33136A9761412.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
